# claude-prompt-writing-skill

A Claude Code skill for expert prompt engineering across LLM coding tools.

## What it does

- Writes prompts for Claude Code, Cursor, Aider, Cline, OpenCode, Gemini, Codex
- Adapts output to target tool conventions (CLAUDE.md, .cursorrules, etc.)
- Uses proven techniques from prompting research

## Installation

```
/plugin marketplace add git@github.com:cosgroveb/claude-prompt-writing-skill.git
/plugin install prompt-writing@claude-prompt-writing-skill
```

Or clone and install locally:

```bash
git clone git@github.com:cosgroveb/claude-prompt-writing-skill.git
cd claude-prompt-writing-skill
make install
```

## Usage

The skill loads automatically when relevant. For complex tasks, invoke the `@prompt-writer` agent for deep mode with full reasoning capabilities.

## Reference Docs

Bundled documentation (loaded on-demand):
- `docs/techniques/` - Chain-of-thought, few-shot, decomposition, etc.
- `docs/tools/` - Tool-specific conventions
- `docs/anti-patterns.md` - Common pitfalls
- `docs/refinement-strategies.md` - Iteration approaches
